mapper.select: select bo.no,title,us.name userName,bo.hit,bo.reg_Date regDate,bo.user_no userNo ,groupNo,orderNo,depthNo from replyboard bo,users us where bo.user_no=us.no order by groupNo desc,orderNo asc
mapper.insert: insert into replyboard values(seq_replyboard_no.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, 0, sysdate, #{userNo}, seq_replyboard_no.currval,1,0)

insert into replyboard values(seq_replyboard_no.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, 0, sysdate, #{userNo}, #{groupNo}, #{orderNo}, #{depthNo+1}) update replyboard set orderNo=orderNo+1 where groupNo=#{groupNo} and orderNo=#{orderNo}
